headline: Occidental Petroleum Remains Well Below Berkshire Prices

headline: Occidental Petroleum: Downgrading To Hold Amid Weaker Profit Expectations, Troubled Chart
summary: Occidental Petroleum faces weak oil prices, bearish trends, and limited catalysts despite solid FCF and cost control. See why OXY stock is downgraded to hold.
